fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -On night one, react to 5 people with either a “Woooooo!”, “Ahhhhhhh!”, “Yeaaaaaah!”, “Awwwwwww!”, or “…”

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If someone attacks you with a basic attack, one autovest will break, powerful 2, unstoppable 3, and overkill 4. Hanging will break 20 autovests
-Depending on what you reacted to someone with, their role will be changed accordingly:
**Woooooo!**: Change the player to Lily (3681)
**Ahhhhhhh!**: Change the player to Kid in a Sheet (3682)
**Yeaaaaaah!**: Change the player to Apple Thief (3683)
**Awwwwwww!** Change the player to Pepper (3684)
**…**: Change the player to Scarface (3685)
-If you target a conversion immune player, just die instead

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that only one of the players you convert wins
